sql.name: queryXhMonthlyDwList
sql.sqlString:
select
a.BANK_NAME,/*银行名称*/ a.BANK_NUMBER,/*银行账号*/ a.BANK_OPEN,/*银行开户行*/ sum(a.INTEREST) as ALL_INTEREST,/*利息*/ a.LENDER_ID,/*出借人ID*/ a.LENDER_ID_CARD,/*出借人身份证号*/ a.LENDER_NAME,/*出借人名称*/ a.LENDER_NUMBER,/*出借编号*/ a.LENDER_STATE,/*出借状态*/ sum(a.MONEY)as ALL_MONEY,/*金额*/ a.PAY_DATE/*付款日期*/
from XH_MONTHLY_DW a where 1=1 $sql

sql.name: queryAssetsAccountingList
sql.sqlString: select g.jhtzrq, (select count(sum(t.interest)) from XH_MONTHLY_DW t,xh_zqtj f , xh_tzsq g1 where 1 = 1 and g1.id = g.id and f.id = t.zqtj_id and g1.id = f.tzsq_id group by t.pay_date) as cjzq, (select c.tzcp_mc from xh_tzcp c where c.id = g.tzcp_id)as tzcp, sum(t.interest)+g.jhtzje as add_up_number, sum(t.interest) as add_up_interest, g.jhtzje as add_up_money, c1.zjhm as lender_id_card, t.lender_name, t.lender_id, g.tzsqbh, g.id as tzsqId from XH_MONTHLY_DW t,xh_zqtj f , xh_tzsq g, xh_cjrxx c1 where 1 = 1 and g.cjrxx_id = c1.id and f.id = t.zqtj_id and g.id = f.tzsq_id $sql

sql.name: queryAssetsAccountingInfoList
sql.sqlString: select sum(t.interest)as add_up_interest, sum(t.money)as add_up_money, t.lender_id_card, t.lender_name, t.lender_id, t.pay_date from XH_MONTHLY_DW t,xh_zqtj f , xh_tzsq g where 1 = 1 and f.id = t.zqtj_id and g.id = f.tzsq_id $sql
